pkgmetadata.longdescription: Allow Access to the 'Dlib' C++ Library // Interface for 'Rcpp' users to 'dlib' http://dlib.net which is a 'C++' toolkit containing machine learning algorithms and computer vision tools. It is used in a wide range of domains including robotics, embedded devices, mobile phones, and large high performance computing environments. This package allows R users to use 'dlib' through 'Rcpp'.
